CmdLine: curl -fsL http://downloads.typesafe.com/scala/$SCALA_VERSION/scala-$SCALA_VERSION.tgz | tar xfz - -C /root/ &&   echo >> /root/.bashrc &&   echo 'export PATH=~/scala-$SCALA_VERSION/bin:$PATH' >> /root/.bashrc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -L -o sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb http://dl.bintray.com/sbt/debian/sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb &&   dpkg -i sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb &&   rm sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y clang-3.8 libgc-dev libunwind-dev libre2-dev &&   sbt sbtVersion
Commands.Name: run
